name: Roll20 Wood Sepia Theme v1
description: A Roll20 theme with wood handout and character sheet backgrounds, scroll Journal background, and a general gray, sepia, gold, and wood color scheme. More pleasant on the eyes than straight white, and not as extreme as a full dark theme.
additional_info:
Thanks to the other Roll20 Dark themes for providing some CSS for me to base this off of.

There are two main things I'd like to clean up.

1. In the character sheet window, when you hover over another tab that isn't selected, it goes to white with white text. I can't figure out how to fix that right now.

2. The small 'As' label down in the lower right in the text input area is still black. If I make it white, it changes all 'label's. I'm sure there's a way to target only that 'as' label, but haven't figured it out yet.
